General.Name: Emperor Watch & Jewellery Limited
General.Description: Emperor Watch & Jewellery Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the sale of watches and jewelry products. The company is involved in retailing European-made watches and self-designed fine jewelry products under the Emperor Jewellery brand name. It sells its products through self-branded stores, watch boutiques, and multi-brand watch stores, as well as through an online shopping platform. Emperor Watch & Jewellery Limited was founded in 1942 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong. The company operates as a subsidiary of Emperor Watch & Jewellery Group Holdings Limited.
General.Address: Emperor Group Centre, Wan Chai, Hong Kong

3.Name: Mr. Chi Fai  Wong A.H.K.S.A., F.C.C.A.
